summary: The diff makes broad backend and frontend functionality changes (stories/comments APIs, UI updates for comments/search/story/nav), but it does not provide clear evidence of addressing a specific deployment/build failure root cause or making targeted build/deploy configuration fixes required by REQ-14.

missing_requirements.requirement: Identify the root cause of the current deployment/build failure and apply code/config changes required so the project builds and deploys successfully when retried.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows significant feature/application code changes but does not show any explicit fix for a build/deployment failure (e.g., dependency/config/DFX/canister build adjustments) or evidence that the standard build/deploy retry issue was identified and resolved. No build/deploy configuration files are shown as modified, and nothing in the diff summary ties changes to a deployment failure root cause.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented/modified backend story storage and APIs (addStory, getStory, getStoriesByCategory, searchStories, getLatestStories) and comment storage/APIs (addComment, getComments).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to fix deployment/build failure (REQ-14) and explicitly states not to add new product features unrelated to the fix. These backend product features are not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified UI for comments submission and display, including Internet Identity gating and posting state text.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-14; constitutes product/UI functionality beyond build/deploy fix scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified header navigation UI/behavior (mobile menu sheet, search toggle, sign-in/sign-out controls).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-14; constitutes UI changes beyond build/deploy fix scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified search page UI and changed search behavior to update URL via window.history.pushState.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-14; constitutes functional/UI change beyond build/deploy fix scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified story page composition to include night mode toggle, ad slot placeholder, affiliate links placeholder, and comments section.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-14; adds/changes product page features beyond fixing deployment/build failure.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend method toggleNightMode that returns the passed boolean without persistence.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-14; appears to be an application feature stub unrelated to deployment/build failure fix.
